trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
This constructor initializes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property using the `columnIndex` value.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 값을 초기화는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>사용 하 여 속성의 `columnIndex` 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values of properties inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs> are initialized to the values specified in `e`.
trans-unit.target: 속성의 값에서 상속 되며, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs>에 지정 된 값으로 초기화 됩니다 `e`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 두 번 클릭 열 구분선 옆에 있는 열의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"></xref> containing the inherited event data.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"> </xref> 상속 된 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 두 번 클릭 열 구분선 옆에 있는 열의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method indicates the column to the left of the double-clicked divider if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>; otherwise, it indicates the column to the right of the double-clicked divider.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 경우 두 번 클릭할된 구분선의 왼쪽에 열을 나타냅니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>속성 값이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>, 그렇지 않으면 두 번 클릭할된 구분선의 오른쪽에 열을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The index is the zero-based index of the column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
The index of the column next to the divider.
